faq.question1: What sizes of containers do you offer?
faq.answer1: We offer a range of container sizes, including 10ft, 20ft, 40ft options, reefers, and special containers.
faq.question2: Do you sell both new and used containers?
faq.answer2: Yes, we provide both new and budget-friendly used containers; cargo worthy, AS IS, WWT.
faq.answer3: Yes, we provide fast and reliable delivery across the UK.
faq.question4: Can I rent a container instead of purchasing one?
faq.answer4: Yes, we offer flexible short-term and long-term container rental options.
faq.question5: How do I place an order?
faq.answer5: For enquiries or assistance, please reach out to us via phone, email, or by submitting a message through the text box on our Contact Us page.

promotions.desc1: This multifunctional 10ft container has a variety of storage and transport uses.
promotions.desc2: The 20ft Shipping container is the most common container and our top seller!
promotions.desc3: The 40ft HC shipping container is a very popular size container. Due to it’s size this container is mostly used for shipping.

architectLanding.faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.
architectLanding.banner_title: Find the right container at the right price with Bolt Containers.
architectLanding.banner_desc: Family-run and trusted across the UK, Bolt Containers delivers high-quality shipping containers with fast, reliable service at competitive prices.
architectLanding.services_desc: Full-service global consulting firm that delivers innovative architecture.
architectLanding.services_itemdesc1: High-quality new and used containers available for purchase. You can choose whether you pick up a container at the depot or have a container delivered to your address.
architectLanding.services_itemdesc2: Flexible short-term and long-term container rental options.
architectLanding.services_itemdesc3: Customised solutions and modifications to meet your unique requirements.
architectLanding.project_desc: Our portfolio of services includes planning & design
architectLanding.featured_subtitle: Extending and improving your home can bring enormous benefits to your life style.
architectLanding.featured_desc1: If you are contemplating the construction or renovation of a building, an architect is the professional who is equipped through training and experience to guide you through the entire process.
architectLanding.featured_desc2: The need to retain an architect is not only a matter of good business, but may also be a legal requirement.
architectLanding.about_desc: At Bolt Containers, we take pride in building strong, lasting relationships with our clients, backed by our industry experience and a commitment to exceptional customer service. As a family-owned business, we put our customers first, ensuring that we can quickly adapt to their evolving container needs while maintaining clear and open communication every step of the way. We are reliable, flexible, and dedicated to delivering quality at every turn.
architectLanding.about_desc2: Our mission is simple: to provide high-quality, tailored services that focus on what our customers truly need. Our close-knit team works on each project with care, ensuring that we always operate to the highest standards.
architectLanding.team_desc: We are skilled on commercial or residential projects,
architectLanding.subscribe_subtitle: Feel free to get in touch and experience the Bolt Containers' different approach.
